title: Cricket 19 – v1300
body:
Cricket 19 – v1300


Genres/Tags: Sports, Cricket, Third-person, 3D
Company: Big Ant Studios
Language: ENG
Original Size: 24.9 GB
Repack Size: 11.5 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 9 other (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Steam v1300 release: 24.9 GB, thanks to iamyashsoni
  • Cricket 19 v1300 Crack by zaxrow applied over
  • Game Controller (or controller emulator, like Keyaboard Splitter) is required to play the game!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 24.9 to 11.5 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~1 hour 10 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~2 hours 20 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 25 GB (up to 72 GB during installation)
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Standalone Update – from my previous repack to v1300

Unpack with 7-zip to installed repack folder and run “Update to v1300.bat”

Cricket_2019_Patch_to_v1300_for_FG_Repack.7z

Game Description

Earn World Glory At The Pinnacle Of Cricket!

Lead your team to international glory with Cricket 19. The truly global cricket simulation from Big Ant Studios, the leading name in authentic, realistic cricket action, Cricket 19 allows you to take control of your team, from club through national level, and lead them to T20, ODI, or Test Match glory.

Create your own club, stadia, sponsor logos and uniforms via Big Ant’s acclaimed Cricket Academy to recreate your local matches and dramas!

Build a rookie player’s career from their junior years at club cricket. Perform well and before you know it, you’ll be leading your nation on to the field.

Game Features

  • Deep player, stadia, logo and scenario creator.
  • Full support for all formats of cricket – T20, ODI and Test Match.
  • Real world AI and tactics.
  • Dozens of teams to choose between.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is HEAVILY backwards compatible with my previous repack of this game. The only changed files are fg-04.bin and setup.exe, plus fg-05.bin has been added. So you can rehash the torrent and save 11.3 GB of traffic.
